---
title: "MTA Alerts - Escalator and Elevator Outages"
output: html_notebook
---

This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook for MTA alerts escalator and elevator outages from 2018 to 2020. This data was scraped from the [MTA Alerts Archive](https://mymtaalerts.com/archive).

Note: Elevator/escalator service alerts were only released starting 2018.

```{r}
library(DBI)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)

## Connect to db
con <- dbConnect(drv=RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname="alerts.db")

alerts <- dbReadTable(con, "mtaalerts")
alerts <- select(alerts, -c(index, Agency))

```


```{r Create dataframe for alerts}
alerts <- alerts %>%
  mutate(Message.Id = as.integer(Message.Id) ) %>%
  mutate(Date = mdy_hm(Date)) %>%
  mutate(elevator_escalator_id = str_match(Message, "(Elevator|Escalator) ((EL|ES)...x?)")[,3]) %>%
  mutate(is_out_of_service = grepl('outage|Outage', Subject)) %>%
  relocate(elevator_escalator_id, is_out_of_service)

write.csv(alerts,"alerts.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
